item.title: About Me
item.description: Hiya – I’m Hao. I like boba, my favorite configuration is: Roasted oolong tea Fresh milk No sugar Less ice Brown sugar boba I also like tennis, badminton, singing, kickboxing, video games. I write code for a living. As of now I’m working for Facebook Meta on some VR stuff.
item.content:
Hiya – I’m Hao.

I like boba, my favorite configuration is:

  • Roasted oolong tea
  • Fresh milk
  • No sugar
  • Less ice
  • Brown sugar boba

I also like tennis, badminton, singing, kickboxing, video games.

I write code for a living. As of now I’m working for Facebook Meta on some VR stuff.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: I’ll take a roasted oolong tea latte with boba, no sugar and less ice, please. Site generated with Hugo based on theme Terminal by panr .
item.content:
I’ll take a roasted oolong tea latte with boba, no sugar and less ice, please.

Site generated with Hugo based on theme Terminal by panr .
